snippet: Investors were looking ahead to the closely watched monthly unemployment report on Friday.
abstract: Major stock indexes dip slightly as investors postpone big bets ahead of government's report on March employment; drop in biotechnology shares drags Nasdaq composite index down nearly 1 percent.
lead_paragraph: Investors were looking ahead to the closely watched monthly unemployment report on Friday.

headline.main: Market Declines as Reluctant Investors Await Release of March Employment Data
headline.print_headline: Market Declines as Reluctant Investors Await Release of March Employment Data
